text.config.items-stack-size-config.opti:
The ids of Items to change the Max Stack Size of.
Each Item needs to have a matching entry in Max Stack Sizes.

The Max Stack Sizes of each Item in Items.
This should be a positive integer.
The Max Stack Size is applied to the Item at the same place in Items.

The ids of Item Tags to change the Max Stack Size of.
Each Item Tag needs to have a matching entry in Max Tag Stack Sizes.
Items that are both part of an Item Tag in this list and are in the Items list
will get the value assigned to them from the Items list

The Max Stack Sizes of each Item Tag in Item Tags.
This should be a positive integer.
The Max Stack Size is applied to the Item Tag at the same place in Item Tags.
